edu.stanford.facs.logicle
Class Logicle

java.lang.Object
  edu.stanford.facs.logicle.Logicle
Direct Known Subclasses:
FastLogicle
public class Logicle
extends java.lang.Object

Implements the Logicle data scale and its inverse. This is a reference implementation, accurate to double precision. It is reasonably fast but not suitable for real time applications. See FastLogicle for a fast lower precision version.

Version:
1.0
Author:
Wayne A. Moore

Constructor Detail

Logicle

public Logicle(double T,
               double W)
Constructor with default number of decades and no additional negative decades

Parameters:
T - the double maximum data value or "top of scale"
W - the double number of decades to linearize

Logicle

public Logicle(double T,
               double W,
               double M)
Constructor with no additional negative decades

Parameters:
T - the double maximum data value or "top of scale"
W - the double number of decades to linearize
M - the double number of decades that a pure log scale would cover

Logicle

public Logicle(double T,
               double W,
               double M,
               double A)
Constructor taking all possible parameters

Parameters:
T - the double maximum data value or "top of scale"
W - the double number of decades to linearize
M - the double number of decades that a pure log scale would cover
A - the double additional number of negative decades to include on scale
Method Detail

axisLabels

public double[] axisLabels()
Choose a suitable set of data coordinates for a Logicle scale

Returns:
a double array of data values

dynamicRange

public double dynamicRange()
Computes the dynamic range of the Logicle scale. For the Logicle scales this is the ratio of the pixels per unit at the high end of the scale divided by the pixels per unit at zero.

Returns:
the double dynamic range

inverse

public double inverse(double scale)
Computes the data value corresponding to the given point of the Logicle scale. This is the inverse of the scale function.

Parameters:
scale - a double scale value
Returns:
the double data value

scale

public double scale(double value)
Computes the Logicle scale value of the given data value

Parameters:
value - a data value
Returns:
the double Logicle scale value
